p: All viruses were harvested from infected cells when 50–75% of the cell monolayer showed evidence of viral cytopathic effect (CPE). Virus titers were either determined by the 50% tissue culture infective dose (TCID 50/mL) method according to Spearman and Kaerber or plaque assay [38]– [40]. Titers typically ranged from 1.0×10 7 to 1.2×10 10 TCID 50/ml.
